title: Traditional Chinese Medicine
description: Traditional Chinese Medicine - Chiropractic Clinic in Houston, TX with specialization, professional identification codes, medical licenses, location, appointment booking contact number details
cleaned_text: Traditional Chinese Medicine is a Chiropractic - Independent Medical Examiner Clinic in Houston, Texas. It is situated at 17045 El Camino Real, Ste 225, Houston and its contact number is 281-488-6300. The authorized person of Traditional Chinese Medicine is Mrs. Leslie M Graham who is Chiropractor/acupuntrist of the clinic and their contact number is 281-488-6300. Primary license number for Traditional Chinese Medicine is DC 5863 (Chiropractic - Independent Medical Examiner) in Texas. Traditional Chinese Medicine Clinic have special evaluators who are not involved with the medical care of the individual examinee that impartially evaluates the care being provided by other practitioners to clarify clinical, disability, liability or other case issues. Chiropractic treatments have been proved effective in many problems, such as continuous back pain, neck pain, headache, digestive problems, balance difficulties, whiplash and other collision injuries, occupational and sports injuries. Some of the other diseases in which chiropractic treatment is helpful are Sciatica, Scoliosis, Fibromyalgia, TMJ disorders etc. Complete Clinic Profile: Traditional Chinese Medicine Clinic speciality, address, contact phone number and fax are as below. Patients can directly walkin to the clinic or can call on the below given phone number for appointment. Specialization: Independent Medical Examiner Chiropractic Clinic Address: 17045 El Camino Fax: 281-480-1959 Authorized/Official Person Profile: Officially authorized person to contact for any management issues or complaints of this clinic are as below. Person's position and contact details are also mentioned below. Name: Mrs. Leslie M Graham Position: Chiropractor/acupuntrist Contact Number: 281-488-6300 Professional Identification Codes: NPI number stands for National Provider Identifier which is a unique 10-digit identification number issued to health care providers in the United States by the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS). NPI details for Traditional Chinese Medicine clinic are as mentioned below. NPI Number: 1558536011 NPI Enumeration Date: 25 Apr, 2008 NPI Last Update On: 25 Apr, 2008 Medical Licenses: Organizations can have one or more medical licenses for different specialities in the same state or different states. Related medical licenses for Traditional Chinese Medicine are as mentioned below. Specialization License Number State Status Independent Medical Examiner DC 5863 Texas Primary Business Mailing Address: Business mailing address can be used for mailing purpose only, for visiting purpose patients need to refer above mentioned address. Address: Traditional Chinese Medicine 17045 El Camino Real, Ste. 225 Texas Zip: 77058-2649 Phone Number: 281-488-6300 Fax Number: 281-480-1959 Patients can reach Traditional Chinese Medicine at 17045 El Camino Real, Ste 225, Houston, Texas or can call to book an appointment on 281-488-6300. Bloom Chiropractic Speciality:Chiropractic Clinic Address: 4061 504-323-5832 Orthopedic Surgeons deals with patients having disorders of the bones, joints, muscles, ligaments, tendons etc. They treat a wide variety of diseases and conditions, like fractures and dislocations; torn ligaments, sprains, and strains; tendon injuries, pulled muscles, bursitis; ruptured disks, sciatica, low back pain, scoliosis; knock knees, bow legs, bunions, hammer toes; arthritis and osteoporosis; bone tumors, muscular dystrophy, cerebral palsy; club foot and unequal leg length; abnormalities & growth of the fingers and toes.
